topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551f13c16368722a3c350900#post_551f13c16368722a3c350900
It was awesome, Asura is the definition of manliness, unlike most shit action heroes, hell even nicer guys like Goku can't match him in terms of being a great hero, because he actually took care of his family, and never willingly brought or allowed harm to befall an innocent person, even when he was completely lost in his rage,

"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551f136463687217da181500#post_551f136463687217da181500
Asura killed *GOD*, as in creator of the universe God, because he made his daughter cry; of course the game was dumb... AND IT WAS AWESOME!
